title: Bloomberg Markets: Lanser Says M&A Market Staying `Hot'

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Howard Lanser Managing Director of Mergers & Acquisitions Group Baird Discussing mergers and acquisitions activity and deals outlook.
